meanings.definition: A type of hat with a round crown and a brim turned up all around.
meanings.sent1: He wore a stylish billycocks to the party.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman tipped his billycocks as he greeted the guests.
meanings.sent3: The billycocks flew off his head in the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: Her billycocks of thoughts protected her from the harsh reality.
meanings.sent5: The billycocks cast a shadow over his face, shielding him from the sun.

meanings.definition: To hit or strike with a billycock hat.
meanings.sent1: He billycocksed the ball out of the park.
meanings.sent2: She playfully billycocksed her friend on the shoulder.
meanings.sent3: The comedian billycocksed the audience with jokes all night.
meanings.sent4: The boxer billycocksed his opponent with a swift punch.
meanings.sent5: The chef billycocksed the dough to perfection before baking.
